tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE water_usage (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id UUID NOT NULL,
  water_consumed DOUBLE PRECISION CHECK (water_consumed >= 0),
  date_recorded TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE user_accounts (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username STRING NOT NULL,
  email STRING NOT NULL,
  password STRING NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE water_meter_readings (
  reading_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id INT,
  reading_date DATE,
  reading_time TIME,
  water_usage FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE water_consumption (
  consumption_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  reading_id INT,
  consumption_date DATE,
  consumption_time TIME,
  usage_category STRING,
  usage_amount FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE WaterConsumptionStats (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    average_daily_usage INT NOT NULL,
    total_usage INT NOT NULL,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
);
CREATE TABLE water_sources (id INT, source_name VARCHAR(255), location VARCHAR(255), water_type VARCHAR(50), capacity INT)
CREATE TABLE water_usage (id INT, source_id INT, date DATE, amount_used FLOAT, unit VARCHAR(50)
CREATE TABLE users (user_id INT, username VARCHAR(50), full_name VARCHAR(100), email VARCHAR(100), address VARCHAR(255)
CREATE TABLE usage_history (id INT, user_id INT, source_id INT, date DATE, amount_used FLOAT)
CREATE TABLE alerts (alert_id INT, user_id INT, source_id INT, alert_msg VARCHAR(255), alert_type VARCHAR(50)
